app.title: AI Video Editor: ShotCut AI
app.description:
ShotCut - a pro AI video editor, offers intuitive AI tools and the most trending content to cater to diverse user needs. Whether a seasoned creator or a novice editor, you can use shotcut to craft unique works.

★ AI Video Editor Tool

- AI Captions
Free trial for transcribing your videos to text is now live! Experience our latest ai technology, smarter sentence segmentation, precise word segmentations, and full support across all major languages!
- AI Automusic
Post your videos to shotcut and enrich them with auto-generated music. We'll match a music set suitable for your video's style.
- Ai Text Generation
 Simply upload your video, specify the platform, and our Ai crafts powerful titles, hashtags, and descriptions for maximum engagement.

★ Basic Video Editing

- Video reverser
Reverse/rewind vid and play video backwards in seconds.
- Video cropper
Crop your video for free. Easily crop your video to any aspect ratios.
- Video cutter & splitter
Cut and split larger video into clips. 
- Video merger & combiner
A free merge tool to combine video clips together.
- Video converter
Convert video to HD quality or MP3  audio. Export video without watermark.
- Video eraser
Video editor no watermark. Remove watermark from video.
- Video sound/audio editor
Extract audio from video and edit audio track of your video. 

★ Pro Video Editing

- Add music to video
Add audio, songs, voice over, and sound effects to video for free. The best video maker with music.
- Stop motion
Create easy stop motion video animations with just your phone! 
- Slow motion
Slow down your videos and create cool slo mo effects online. 
- Blur video
Add blur/mosaic to video. Pixelate videos.
- PIP
Create a Picture in Picture and overlay video like a pro.
- Video effects & filters
Transition effects for videos, slow mo fx, bold glamour filter, hyperlapse, and etc. ShotCut is loaded with reel templates for Instagram & effect house templates for TikTok. 
- Video stabilizer
Stabilize shaky footage for free. Remove the effect of camera shake from captured videos.
- Green screen editor
Remove a selected color from video with the chroma key tehnique.
- Video background remover
Video cutout. Remove background from video without green screen.

As a full-featured editing app for videos, ShotCut can be used for multi purposes:

Free video editor, maker, and creator
A free video maker to generate slideshows, movies, vlogs for TikTok, YouTube, and Instagram platforms.

Movie maker & editor
Make a movie for free with a standard 24 fps frame rate. Edit films or movies like a pro.

Slideshow maker
Free photo video slideshow maker with music and voice over. Picture video maker: convert live photo to video.

Free collage maker
Make video collage for free, layout video and photo collage as you want.

Slow motion video editor
Make slow and fast motion video from normal frame rate footage. 

Video speed editor
Adjust video velocity with fast & slow motion fx. Speed up or slow down video without losing video quality.

Reels maker & editor
Instagram reel maker, Instagram editor, free reel maker, instagram video editor.

YouTube editor
The best editing app for YouTube. Easily create vlogs and music videos.

TikTok editor
Edit videos for TikTok without CapCut video editor and Effect House.

Instagram post maker
Create Instagram posts with a plethora of reel templates.

Make the most of ShotCut as a video editor, movie maker, slideshow maker, or whatever you need it for!

 Disclaimer: 
ShotCut is not affiliated, associated, sponsored, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter.
 
Stay connected with us on: https://discord.gg/DYHA9W7Xaa

app.summary: AI editing app for videos, slideshows, and movies.Pro video editor & maker.

reviews.text: This app works well, it's a cool editing app. Problem is, while editing more than 1 minute video, this app is not loading some of the video clips in preview, it displayed green screen for that clip while preview. Work around is, I have to go to trim view of that video clip everytime and then it start appear in preview while we play the edit window. This is literally annoying and consumed more time while editing. Please resolve the issue (or) share the steps for permanent solution. Thanks.
reviews.replyText: Hello Vinoth, We apologize for the less than optimal experience while using our app. Your support and feedback mean a lot to us in making improvements. We'll make sure to share your suggestions with our developers. Thanks! -GP

reviews.text: This is a really good app you can get amazing templates and edit like a pro! Really recommend you to install this . But can you pls add a AI voice over option and more effects💫, the only problem is that the new templates aren't coming I've tried updating but nothing happened! It makes me lose interest on this app, at first new templates came every week but now it's been months thenew templates aren't coming at all, pls fix this issue or else it's a amazing app for everyone!

A little annoying to make larger videos, but for a free product its just amazing. It's easy to use & has a lot of features. I can add text over top, all kinds of cool stuff. Makes my video much smaller for easier uploads. I want to pay for the pro version, but the price is outrageous for my limited use

ShotCut AI Video Editor is a popular app on the Google Play Store, boasting over 10 million downloads and an average rating of 4.5 stars from approximately 280,000 reviews. Users appreciate its AI-driven features, such as automatic captioning, music generation, and text generation, which simplify the editing process. The app also offers basic editing tools like video reversing, cropping, and speed adjustment. However, some users have reported issues, including lag during clip splitting, unex

looks excellent so far, I've only just started with it though! The only little gripe that I've found with it, is the image to video and script to video, you have to pay extra for, and at £16.99 for 20 videos at the rate that works out best value is very expensive! So I'll probably stick to the video generator that I already use, as I only pay £36 for a year with that! But as far as the editing side of things go, it looks to be excellent with loads of features.

This app can not cope with videos that are more than 3 minutes long. App keeps crashing as I try to edit 8-minute videos. I thought it was good on the first day of my free trial, but I will definitely be cancelling before the trial is over. It's caused me a headache today. A simple edit and cut took over an hour when it took me 5 minutes on a social media app editor. You need to fix this. It's good for joining videos, if they aren't very long or you have hours to waste whilst it freezes.
reviews.replyText: Hi Andrea, sorry for the unpleasant experience. We suggest you to clear the cache and re-launch the app. If the problem still occurs, let us know at getsupport@shotcut.app. Thank you. -GP

reviews.text: I was trying to edit a video on splice before I got this app. I was trying to add a filter but the video started lagging like crazy. So I had to download this. Splice is fine for extremely basic editing but it's better to get used to a more complicated app like this from the start. Great experience so far. Edit: I am. Owing back after month to edit my review. I'm leaving two stars. The exports are very blury. That's it.
reviews.replyText: Hi Colt, Thanks for the positive review! 😊🌟 We're continously working to make the app better for your comfort and satisfaction. If you like it, support us with a 5-star rating. User ratings are important for us to improve. Thank you. -GP

reviews.text: Used to love this app. Paid for the elite subscription and now have watermarks on my videos that I can't seem to get rid of. I've tried everything to remove the watermarks... including clearing cache, reinstalling the app and more. Not cool. This app is a one star!!!! And I would like A REFUND!!! I just updated the app. The watermark issue has been fixed. Back to 5 stars

I truly cannot recommend this app. I became a paid user because of all the positive reviews, but I'm now not sure they're all genuine. This app is buggy, laggy, inconsistent. Customer service is slow to fix issues. Problems I've had: -Huge lag to split a clip. (Appears to have been fixed) -Forced watermark on videos of paid users. Lost hours of work because of this, starting over on another app. Took them almost a week to fix. -Audio lags after export. Right in preview, wrong in export
reviews.replyText: Hi Rob, Sorry for the inconvenience. Can you share more details on email at getsupport@shotcut.app. We can help you with some guides or tutorials to create amazing videos. Thank you! -GP

reviews.text: Despite how the advertisement for this app appears and seems a little deceptive saying you can use and try it for free. No, you can't. It's just like everyone else, a subscription based. After you give up your credit card information and all of course. Plus just like a recent new thing everyone is doing full of pointless sometimes loud ads. What the hell is up with that lately. Between that and just overall and general bad apps
reviews.replyText: ShotCut is free to use with ads.You can export without paying as long as you choose free tools. Payment is required only for Elite features such as free ads, ChromaKey, special effects etc. You can try the free Elite version for 7 days and decide later whether to cancel it. Please contact us at https://discord.gg/DYHA9W7Xaa for any questions. -EM

app.AIReview:
AI Video Editor: ShotCut AI – A Comprehensive Review

Overview

ShotCut AI, currently boasting over 43 million installs and a robust 4.3-star rating (based on 322,914 user reviews), presents itself as an accessible yet powerful AI video editor for both beginners and experienced creators. The app’s core promise revolves around simplifying the video editing process through intelligent automation – specifically with features like AI captions and automated music generation. It positions itself within the competitive video player & editor space, aiming to bridge the gap between complex professional software and overly simplistic mobile editors. The free-to-use model is a key differentiator, attracting a broad user base seeking experimentation without financial commitment.

Key Features

The app's functionality centers around several key AI-driven features:

  • AI Captions: This is arguably the most compelling feature highlighted by ShotCut AI. It utilizes AI to transcribe video content into text in real-time. The description emphasizes “smarter sentence segmentation” and “precise word segmentations,” suggesting an improved accuracy compared to basic automated captioning tools found in other apps. Support for major languages is a critical component, broadening its appeal.
  • AI Automusic: This feature allows users to upload their videos directly to ShotCut AI and receive automatically generated music tracks tailored to the video’s content. The exact details of the algorithm driving this functionality remain somewhat opaque but represents a significant time-saver for creators.
  • Standard Video Editing Tools: Beyond the AI elements, ShotCut AI includes expected standard video editing features: trimming, cutting, merging clips, adding transitions, and adjusting audio levels. The app supports common video formats (though specifics aren’t detailed) and provides basic color correction tools.
  • Slideshow Creation: The app facilitates the creation of slideshows from uploaded images and videos, offering a simple way to produce short-form content.

Strengths

Several aspects contribute to ShotCut AI's current success:

  • Accessibility: The free price point is a major draw for users hesitant to invest in premium video editing software. The intuitive interface aims to lower the barrier to entry for novice editors.
  • AI-Powered Automation: The AI captioning and automusic features represent genuinely innovative tools that can significantly speed up workflow, particularly for content creators focused on rapid production. The potential accuracy of the AI transcription is a crucial factor here.
  • Large User Base & Positive Rating: A user base exceeding 43 million demonstrates significant traction and validates the app's usefulness to a substantial audience. A rating above 4 stars reflects generally positive user experiences.
  • Comprehensive Feature Set (Beyond AI): While the AI features are prominent, ShotCut AI doesn’t solely rely on them. It offers a robust set of traditional editing tools alongside its intelligent automation capabilities.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, ShotCut AI has areas needing refinement:

  • AI Accuracy & Customization: The description promises "smarter sentence segmentation" and “precise word segmentations.” However, without independent testing, it’s difficult to assess the actual accuracy of the AI captioning feature compared to dedicated transcription services. More granular control over the AI – allowing users to tweak segments or correct errors – would dramatically improve its usability.
  • Automusic Algorithm Variety: The “AI Automusic” feature needs more demonstrable diversity in musical output. Currently, it's unclear how much creative control users have beyond selecting a general mood (e.g., ‘happy,’ ‘sad,’ ‘epic’). Expanding the music library and allowing users to influence genre selection would greatly enhance this feature.
  • Limited Export Options: The app’s description lacks detail regarding export formats, resolution options, and video compression settings. Offering a wider range of export choices is crucial for professional-grade output.
  • Performance on Low-End Devices: With 43 million installs, it's plausible there are users experiencing performance issues on older or less powerful mobile devices. Optimizing the app for lower specifications would improve accessibility.

User Experience

The user interface appears to be designed with simplicity in mind. The layout is relatively clean and uncluttered, making navigation intuitive for beginners. The drag-and-drop functionality for editing clips and adding transitions contributes to a smooth workflow. However, the reliance on AI features might introduce occasional delays or processing hiccups, particularly when generating captions or music. The app’s responsiveness could be improved with further optimization. A tutorial section would greatly benefit new users navigating the various features.

Value for Money

As a free application, ShotCut AI offers substantial value to casual video editors and content creators experimenting with AI-powered tools. The core editing functionality is competent enough for basic projects. The significant benefit lies in the potential of the AI features – particularly the automatic captioning – which can save considerable time and effort. For users seeking professional-level results or extensive customization options, a paid subscription model would likely be necessary to unlock more advanced features and refine the AI output.

Conclusion

ShotCut AI demonstrates promise as an accessible and innovative video editing solution. Its free price point, combined with its AI-driven automation tools (especially the captioning feature), makes it a compelling option for users of all skill levels. While improvements are needed in terms of AI accuracy, music algorithm diversity, and export options, ShotCut AI’s current strengths – coupled with its large user base – position it as a strong contender within the crowded mobile video editing market. It's definitely worth downloading and experimenting with, especially if you're looking for a free way to explore AI in your video creation workflow.
